headline: What Makes Arista Networks (ANET) a Good Investment?
summary: TCW funds, an investment management company, released its “TCW Concentrated Large Cap Growth Fund” third-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Equity markets continued their rally in the third quarter, driven by continued optimism around AI investments and positive corporate earnings. Against this backdrop, the fund (I share) returned +4.11% […]
